title: Authors and Citation
text: Winskill P (2023). site: Site specific malariasimulation modelling. R package version 0.2.2.
code: @Manual{,   title = {site: Site specific malariasimulation modelling},   author = {Pete Winskill},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.2.2}, }

title: Site specific malariasimulation modelling
text: Site acts translational layer site file malariasimulation. site file file storing context specific information site, historical intervention coverage, seasonality, vectors etc. simulate given site, must convert information input parameter list malaria simulation. site ! correctly configured site file example_site, need create parameter list pass malariasimulation run:
code: site <- example_site site_par <- site_parameters(   interventions = site$interventions,   demography = site$demography,   vectors = site$vectors,   seasonality = site$seasonality,   eir = site$eir,   overrides = list(human_population = 10000) ) site_sim <- malariasimulation::run_simulation(   timesteps = site_par$timesteps,   parameters = site_par )

title: Site specific malariasimulation modelling
text: can install development version site GitHub :

title: Add demography — add_demography
text: p parameter list demography site demography

title: Add all interventions — add_interventions
text: p parameter list interventions site intervention inputs species Can falciparum: "pf" vivax: "pv", vivax SMC, RTSS PMC implemented

title: Add IRS — add_irs
text: p parameter list interventions site intervention inputs

text: p parameter list interventions site intervention inputs

text: p parameter list interventions site intervention inputs

text: p parameter list seasonality site seasonality

title: Add SMC — add_smc
text: p parameter list interventions site intervention inputs

title: Add treatment — add_treatment
text: p parameter list interventions site intervention inputs

title: Add vectors — add_vectors
text: p parameter list vectors site vectors

title: An example country site file — example_site
text: site file containing input components running setting-specific malariasimulation model run.

title: An example country site file — example_site
An example country site file — example_site
text: list 10 variables: country iso3c country code level level subnational disaggregation sites Unique sites epi Epidemiological site data interventions Intervention coverage specification population Population population risk projections demography Demographic projections vectors Vector proportions seasonality Seasonal profile parameters

what: Median set of parameters for R21 — profile
title: Median set of parameters for R21 — profile
text: list containing median set parameters R21 vaccine per Imperial group draft manuscript.

title: Median set of parameters for R21 — profile
Median set of parameters for R21 — profile
text: list 2 variables: r21_profile profile initial 3 doses R21 r21_booster_profile profile booster dose R21

text: p parameter list min_ages Minimum age bands incidence n_age outputs

what: site: Site specific malariasimulation modelling — site-package
title: site: Site specific malariasimulation modelling — site-package
text: package converts parameterised "site file" malariasimulation model input parameter list.

title: site: Site specific malariasimulation modelling — site-package
Create site parameters — site_parameters
code: site_parameters(   interventions,   demography,   vectors,   seasonality,   min_ages = c(0, 5, 15) * 365,   species = "pf",   eir = NULL,   overrides = list(),   burnin = 0 )

title: Create site parameters — site_parameters
text: interventions Site intervention inputs demography Site demography inputs vectors Site vectors inputs seasonality Site seasonality inputs min_ages Lower age bands incidence N age outputs species Can falciparum: "pf" vivax: "pv", vivax SMC, RTSS PMC implemented eir Site baseline EIR overrides List malariasimulation default parameter overrides burnin Number burn years
